lines.txt: Shape of You - Ed Sheeran
The club isn't the best place to find a lover
lines.trans: 俱乐部不是找另一半的绝佳场所

lines.txt: So the bar is where I go
lines.trans: 所以酒吧很适合我

lines.txt: Me and my friends at the table doing shots
lines.trans: 我和朋友们百无聊赖的喝着酒

lines.txt: Drinking fast and then we talk slow
lines.trans: 我们喝的很急 却漫不经心的聊着

lines.txt: You come over and start up a conversation with just me
lines.trans: 你向我走来 开始跟我搭讪

lines.txt: And trust me I'll give it a chance now
lines.trans: 相信我 我会给你机会的

lines.txt: Take my hand stop put Van the Man on the jukebox
lines.trans: 牵起我的手 我们点首Van The Man（爱尔兰歌手）的歌吧

lines.txt: And then we start to dance and now I'm singing like
lines.trans: 然后我们就可以翩然起舞了 此刻我的歌声像是

lines.txt: Girl you know I want your love
lines.trans: 女孩 你知道我渴望你的爱

lines.txt: Your love was handmade for somebody like me
lines.trans: 你的爱为我量身打造 专属于我

lines.txt: Come on now follow my lead
lines.trans: 来吧 听我指挥吧

lines.txt: I may be crazy don't mind me
lines.trans: 或许我有点疯狂 请不要介意

lines.txt: Say boy let's not talk too much
lines.trans: 说小子 不必多说废话

lines.txt: Grab on my waist and put that body on me
lines.trans: 将你的手搭上我的腰 贴近我吧

lines.txt: Come on now follow my lead
lines.trans: 来吧 听我指挥吧

lines.txt: Come come on now follow my lead
lines.trans: 来吧 来吧 听我指挥吧

lines.txt: I'm in love with the shape of you
lines.trans: 我爱上了你妙曼的姿态

lines.txt: We push and pull like a magnet do
lines.trans: 缠绵之间 我们像是磁铁般相互吸引

lines.txt: Although my heart is falling too
lines.trans: 尽管我的心早已为你沦陷

lines.txt: I'm in love with your body
lines.trans: 你的身体让我无比眷恋

lines.txt: Last night you were in my room
lines.trans: 昨晚你在我房间过夜

lines.txt: And now my bed sheets smell like you
lines.trans: 今晨床单上你的香气流连

lines.txt: Every day discovering something brand new
lines.trans: 每一天似乎焕然一新

lines.txt: I'm in love with your body
lines.trans: 你的身体让我无比眷恋

lines.txt: Oh I oh I oh I oh I
lines.trans: 噢 我无法自拔沦陷

lines.txt: I'm in love with your body
lines.trans: 你的身体让我无比眷恋

lines.txt: Oh I oh I oh I oh I
lines.trans: 噢 我无法自拔沦陷

lines.txt: I'm in love with your body
lines.trans: 你的身体让我无比眷恋

lines.txt: Oh I oh I oh I oh I

lines.txt: I'm in love with your body
lines.trans: 你的身体让我无比眷恋

lines.txt: Every day discovering something brand new
lines.trans: 每一天似乎焕然一新

lines.txt: I'm in love with the shape of you
lines.trans: 我爱上了你妙曼的姿态

lines.txt: One week in we let the story begin
lines.trans: 一周时间 就让这爱情故事上演吧

lines.txt: We're going out on our first date
lines.trans: 我们可以开始属于我们的初次约会

lines.txt: You and me are thrifty so go all you can eat
lines.trans: 我们都很节俭 那就随你喜欢尽情挥霍一次

lines.txt: Fill up your bag and I fill up a plate
lines.trans: 包包里塞满吃的 我可以装满餐盘

lines.txt: We talk for hours and hours about the sweet and the sour
lines.trans: 这酸或甜足以让我们聊上几个小时

lines.txt: And how your family is doing okay
lines.trans: 你的家人还好吗

lines.txt: Leave and get in a taxi then kiss in the backseat
lines.trans: 坐上的士离开 我们在后座上热吻

lines.txt: Tell the driver make the radio play and I'm singing like
lines.trans: 让司机打开收音机 我的歌声像是
